patthana17.7:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana17.7:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana17.7:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
